contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 4, 1990 D LHCBBA Watford Contest (Fourth Section)
LHCBBA Watford Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest LHCBBA Watford Contest watford-fourth-section
Watford Colosseum, Watford, Hertfordshire, England, UK British Bandsman 10/11/1990 gives Desborough Silver as winners - no record of a band in Desborough since 1892. Conductor of Ellesborough Silver around 1990 was Duncan Wells logic therefore would indicate that the correct winners are Ellesborough.
Nov. 16, 2014, 12:27 p.m. Nov. 16, 2014, 12:33 p.m.
1 Ellesborough Silver Band Duncan Wells
2 Croft Silver Band Unknown
3 Chinnor Silver Band David Pegram
